com.onfleet.demo.homework.struct

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.onfleet.demo.homework.struct.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Immutable
public class Task
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Specifies an individual task object, which is assignable to a Driver and further described by a Location.

    Each task also has a unique UUID, assigned at initial construction.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
